subject: Baseball
Robberies and Thefts
Memorabilia and Souvenirs
Museums
lead_paragraph: On his birthday, Berra, a Hall of Fame catcher for the Yankees, oversaw the unveiling of replicas of his World Series championship rings and M.V.P. awards that were stolen from a museum.
snippet: On his birthday, Berra, a Hall of Fame catcher for the Yankees, oversaw the unveiling of replicas of his World Series championship rings and M.V.P. awards that were stolen from a museum.
